definition: lit. a dream of Nanke/fig. dreams of grandeur
south
surname Nan
tree branch/stem/ax handle
surname Ke
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
dream/CL:場|场[chang2],個|个[ge4]/(bound form) to dream

sentences.english: Of course it became a popular story.
sentences.chinese: 当然叫座也就成了南柯一梦。

sentences.english: We frequently after the dream wakes, in mastication deep disappointed.
sentences.chinese: 我们常常在南柯一梦之后醒来，在咀嚼中深深失望。

sentences.english: It means that all the wealth in the world is nothing but a dream.
sentences.chinese: “南柯一梦”比喻世间荣华富贵不过是一场空梦。

definition: see 黃粱夢|黄粱梦[huang2 liang2 meng4]
